Articles.Content:
Would it be possible to create a maneuver node while stationary on a surface?

If so, how?

You dare blaspheme the Machine God!? The Omnissiah shall purge you!

Seriously, some sort of navigation and in-flight assistance would be nice.
Wait really? Are there any mods that let me do it?

Wait really? Are there any mods that let me do it?

Nothing really, the only thing close is kOS
From the ground you have no orbit from which to create a maneuver node. Because the current stock system requires an orbit to place the maneuver editor gizmo on, there is no possible way.

I'd wish, stock game contained a flight planning tool. Form ascent profile to setting all the maneuver nodes to reentry and landing ... not in our lives.

<- Hides in the bushes before MechJeb adepts arrive

You'll have to start including the KSPTOT adepts to your list of ppl to hide from

If Arrowstar actually gets around to completing his ascent guidance portion of the software (currently on hold, not really his thing so won't be a priority for a while, if ever) then you'll have your complete package. As of right now it can do all the orbital stuff and has aerobraking code you can use to assist with landing since it's not really designed for that
